you_should_activate_the_save_feature: You Should Activate The Save Feature
or_extract_phone_number_from_copied_text: Or Extract Phone Number from copied text
no_phone_number_found_in_the_copied_text: No phone number found in the copied text
are_you_sure_you_want_to_remove_the_hist: Are you sure you want to remove the history?after the delete is successful there is no going back
stop_saving_numbers_desc: Stopping Numbers Save Feature will delete all the numbers that have been saved so far and you will not be able to save a new one. Are you sure you want to stop?
label_hint: Enter Something to let you remember the number in case you need it
entered_text_not_contains_phone_numbers: The Entered text not contains any valid number
share_text: "Whatsapp Direct is your quick gateway to communication! Now, you can send WhatsApp messages to any number without the hassle of saving it in your contacts. Just enter the number, type your message, and let the app open a fast communication window! Say goodbye to the hassle of saving numbers and enjoy quicker, easier messaging
paste_text_and_get_number: Paste Any Text and go to the Whatsapp
